channel.title: Changelog on Luwu.AI - AI Research Lab
channel.description: Recent content in Changelog on Luwu.AI - AI Research Lab

item.title: December 2025 Update
item.description:
üéâ Website Launch

‚ú® New Features

  • Official launch of Luwu.AI Lab website
  • Modern design built with Hugo
  • Responsive layout supporting mobile access
  • Integrated blog system for technical article publishing

üìù Content Updates

  • Completed “About Us” page
  • Published first batch of technical blog posts
    • Understanding the Transformer Architecture
    • Diffusion Models: A New Paradigm for AI Image Generation
    • Introduction to Reinforcement Learning: From Zero to AlphaGo

üöÄ Project Releases

  • LuwuLLM - Lightweight Chinese language model (in development)
  • VisionPlus - Multimodal vision system (Alpha version)
  • RLAgent - Universal reinforcement learning framework (v1.0)

üî¨ Research Progress

NLP Direction

  • Completed Chinese pre-training corpus construction (500GB+)
  • LuwuLLM model architecture design completed
  • Started first round of pre-training experiments

Computer Vision

  • VisionPlus achieved baseline performance on COCO dataset
  • Implemented multimodal feature fusion module
  • Started video understanding feature development

Reinforcement Learning

  • RLAgent framework released stable version
  • Added 5 classic RL algorithm implementations
  • Completed integration with Unity ML-Agents

üë• Team Updates

  • Laboratory officially established
  • Core team assembled
  • Defined research directions and development roadmap

üìÖ Next Month’s Plan

Technical Development

  • LuwuLLM Beta release
  • VisionPlus video features launch
  • Open source first batch of toolkits

Content Output

  • Publish 1-2 technical blog posts weekly
  • Record series of tutorial videos
  • Organize open-source project documentation

Community Building

  • Establish GitHub organization
  • Launch open-source project contribution guidelines
  • Host online technical sharing sessions

Thank you to everyone following and supporting Luwu.AI Lab! Let’s explore the infinite possibilities of AI together.
